rows.label: tlk401010_msg0001
rows.name:
There may be such movements
on the Superbian side.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0002
rows.name:
However, there are absolutely no
suspicious movements from Invidia.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0004
rows.name:
We simply trust in our queen.
At her command, we would
even lay down our arms.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0005
rows.name: Therefore, there is no need for tricks.

rows.label: tlk401010_msg0006
rows.name:
...However, if we are told
to take up arms, we will
fight Superbia here and now.
